body_html:
Ah, well, I dont really trust eps to show non-zeroness. Floats are only reliable-ish to 6-7 sfs, and eps is 1e-8, way smaller than that.

Checking the number of entries greater than say 0.001 would be ok.
body_text:
Ah, well, I dont really trust eps to show non-zeroness. Floats are only reliable-ish to 6-7 sfs, and eps is 1e-8, way smaller than that.
Checking the number of entries greater than say 0.001 would be ok.
body:
Ah, well, I dont really trust eps to show non-zeroness. Floats are only reliable-ish to 6-7 sfs, and eps is 1e-8, way smaller than that.

Checking the number of entries greater than say 0.001 would be ok.
